page.description: If the 'checkbox' column in the Grid has been turned on, executes a search on the Grid that returns the checked records.

argument.name: flagUncheckedRows
argument.description: filterCheckedRows takes an optional argument to filter the unchecked rows as opposed to the checked rows.

page.discussion: This is useful if you want to perform some subsequent action on just the checked records, such as printing a report, or exporting data to Excel. Once you have performed a filter on the checked rows, you can export the currently selected records, or print the currently selected records.
